articles.title: LegalDocs Launches Innovative Online Platform for Seamless Legal Documentation
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A company initially launched in 1996, has officially announced the launch of its innovative online platform. This platform is designed to streamline and simplify the creation of legal documents, making vital legal documents accessible to everyone.

articles.title: Mentos turns up the volume on emerging Aussie Acts with Rolling Stone Australia
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Mentos, in collaboration with Rolling Stone Australia, has launched "Mentos Fresh Sounds," a new national campaign aimed at supporting emerging Australian musicians. The initiative provides a platform, the Mentos Fresh Sounds Portal, for artists to submit their music for review and potential exposure on Rolling Stone and Vinyl Media platforms.

articles.title: Walmart's Open Call 2025 Applications Now Live
articles.summary: Walmart's Open Call 2025 is open for applications from US-based businesses with shelf-ready products and innovations in manufacturing. The program offers a chance to pitch to Walmart and Sam's Club buyers for potential placement in stores or online.

articles.title: Mentos launches ‘Fresh Sounds' with Rolling Stone to champion emerging Aussie music talent
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Mentos, in partnership with Rolling Stone Australia, launched Mentos Fresh Sounds, a new campaign designed to support emerging Australian music talent. The campaign includes a dedicated portal where artists can submit their music for discovery, with the best submissions showcased on a special hub across Rolling Stone and Vinyl Media platforms.

articles.title: Worth It: This Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine on Amazon
articles.author: Savannah Born
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl by Creami ice cream maker which has 13 features that can turn nearly anything into a tasty frozen dessert. It can make soft serves, sorbets and even milkshakes and also include soft serve capabilities upgrade with added programs like fruit whip, frozen custard and swirled lite ice cream.

articles.title: Xbox Insiders New Features Hint at Xbox's Future
articles.author: Jason Siu
articles.summary: Xbox is adding cloud-playable console titles to the Xbox PC app, enabling users to browse cloud-playable games from their play history and library. The collection includes titles from original Xbox to Xbox Series X|S, and can be accessed via purchased games or Game Pass, aiming to ease game access across devices.

articles.title: Turn home decor into dopamine with this color drenching hack — now on sale
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: Nix introduces the Nix Mini 3, a portable color sensor, allowing users to scan colors and instantly match them to over 200,000 brand-name paint colors. This tool is designed for home projects, design businesses, painters, and graphic designers, offering precise color matching.

articles.title: Innovative Crinkle Fabric with Delicate Micro-Lace Texture (Tricot Machine and Weft-insertion MC)
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: GrandStar introduces a next-generation Crinkle fabric. The fabric incorporates three-dimensional wrinkle design.

articles.title: The Turkmenistan Exchange launched a new client system
articles.author: Aijahan Ataballyeva
org: State Commodity and Raw Materials Exchange of Turkmenistan
articles.summary: The State Commodity and Raw Materials Exchange of Turkmenistan launched "My Account", a new system for clients. The system aims to increase the transparency, accessibility and promptness of the provided services. This launch supports Turkmenistan's digital economy development programs.

articles.title: Dion Is A New App For Sending Drinks To Friends & Dates
articles.summary: Dion, co-founded by a software engineer, is launched as an app aiming to be the 'Venmo of beverages'. The app facilitates sending drinks to others and uses AI as a virtual concierge to recommend restaurants and bars. Currently, the app is invite-only, operating in 70 venues, with plans to expand to Las Vegas and Los Angeles.

articles.title: RetailNOW and the Kiosk Industry Association Visit Booth 445 for AI-Assist, Kiosks and Digital Signage
articles.author: Kiosk Industry Group
articles.summary: meldCX provides a suite of AI-driven software products and platforms. UrwayHoldings is showcasing the AI Connect Bar for Conversational AI Audio. Pyramid Computer presents the new 15" Pixi Countertop kiosk. OptConnect offers the max aware router which provides fully managed cellular connectivity and Giada introduces Digital Signage MiniPC. Sitekiosk released Interactive Digital Signage Software. AI Assist Database of Companies launched a list of already deployed AI resources for self-service.

articles.title: US-Phoenix  30% off lifetime  10G uplink  40G NVMe $7/month
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Dynu introduces affordable True NVMe Virtual Private Servers, offering reliable and super-fast performance with 100% NVMe SSDs. The VPS solution is fully KVM based.

articles.title: Can One Founder Launch A Million Dollar Product Brand With AI?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Pietra introduced new AI Assistants. These assistants automate sourcing, fulfillment, and marketing. They help entrepreneurs launch and grow brands.

articles.title: Top Lip and Cheek Tint To Buy For A Natural, Dewy Flush
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra introduces new blush products from several brands. Makeup Revolution Blusher Reloaded is an easy-to-blend powder blush. Praush Juicy Jelly Blush Tint is a versatile tint for lips and cheeks. Milagro Beauty Gula-Bae Cream Blush contains Rosemary and Vitamin E, and FAE Beauty Lush Liquid Blush offers a breathable, long-lasting formula.

articles.title: Sainsbury's makes huge change to Nectar card prices from Friday
articles.author: Alex Evans
articles.summary: Sainsbury's is updating its Nectar loyalty scheme by launching new features for 'Your Nectar Prices'. Customers must now activate personalized discounts weekly via the Nectar app to use them at supermarket checkouts, starting July 25th, 2025. This rollout aims to offer customers savings on frequently purchased products.

articles.title: Budget Beast: 512GB SSD, 12GB RAM
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: A new ultra-light mini PC has been launched, weighing only 400 grams. It's designed for portability and everyday tasks such as internet browsing, multimedia playback, and office productivity. The device aims to provide a versatile computing solution for students, remote workers, and digital nomads.

articles.title: True KVM SSD VPS, Free Double Ram & Bandwidth, IP`s available upto /24, Try us Now
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: ProlimeHost offers Virtual Private Servers and is providing free double bandwidth and RAM on all new KVM SSD VPS orders for a limited time. This promotion does not require a coupon.

articles.title: realme Unveils the All-New realme 15 and 15 Pro: The AI Party Phone is Here!
articles.author: Rahul Dolare
articles.summary: realme has launched its new smartphone lineup, the realme 15 and realme 15 Pro, designed for content creators and photography enthusiasts. The realme 15 Pro features a 50+50+50MP triple camera system with 4K 60FPS video recording, a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, a 7000mAh battery, and a 6500 nits curved AMOLED display. The realme 15 series will soon be available across online and Mainline platforms.

articles.title: Taco Bell reveals new menu item with dream partner
articles.author: Fernanda Tronco
articles.summary: Taco Bell is launching the new Dulce de Leche Cinnabon Delights for a limited time, available at participating locations starting July 31. The new dessert is an upgraded version of the original Cinnabon Delights, featuring a Dulce de Leche filling and salted caramel sugar coating. Customers can also get a promotional offer from July 31 through August 6, by ordering a two-pack via Uber Eats app.

articles.title: Vivo Y19s Pro Launched in Pakistan- Check Price and Features
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Vivo has launched the Y19s Pro smartphone in Pakistan, priced at Rs. 43,999. This new model features a 6000mAh battery with 44W FlashCharge, a 6.68-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate, and a 50MP HD main camera. It is available in three colors: Glacier Blue, Pearl Silver, and Glossy Black.

articles.title: Emma giving away £430 of free gifts including pillows and protector in mattress deal
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Emma is offering free sleep essentials with selected mattresses in their Ultimate Summer Giveaway, including the Emma Hybrid Thermosync Mattress and Emma Hybrid Airgrid Mattress. The Emma Hybrid Thermosync Mattress features ThermoSynch technology for temperature regulation, while the Emma Hybrid Airgrid Mattress includes AirGrid technology for a 'floating' feeling and UltraDry cover.

articles.title: FLUX 1 Kontext & Playground API: The Next Evolution in in‑Context Visual AI.
articles.summary: Black Forest Labs has launched FLUX 1 Kontext, a new generative AI platform designed for visual-first workflows, along with the Playground API. FLUX 1 Kontext offers tiered options (pro, max, dev) tailored to different user needs, focusing on in-context flow matching for precise control over image generation and editing. The Playground API provides a user-friendly environment for testing and integrating the platform, emphasizing transparency, compliance, and scalability for enterprise applications.

articles.title: Ford Bronco New Energy SUV - Up To 1220Km Range, 105.4kWh Battery, ADAS And More
articles.author: Lakshya Rana
articles.summary: Ford has unveiled the Bronco New Energy SUV in China. The vehicle will be available in electric and plug-in hybrid powertrain options, borrowing styling cues from the ICE-powered Bronco and Bronco Sport models.

articles.title: Nando's adds new menu items including perfect 'girl dinner' dish
articles.author: mylondonnewsdesk@reachplc.com
articles.summary: Nando's has launched new menu items, including the Super Caesar Wrap, priced at £10.25 on its own, and the returning Nandino Burger, available for £6.25 as part of the Nandino selection. Additionally, Garlic barbecue sauce has been declared the nation's sauce of the summer and is now available for customers to request with their dishes.

articles.title: 35 Affordable Beauty Buys People Will Ask You About
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Nivea introduces skin-firming gel cream with Q10. Gold Bond launches firming neck and chest cream. Lottabody releases Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Catrice launches "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Essence introduces Lash Princess mascara and Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops. E.l.f. launches Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, Halo Glow Liquid Filter, and Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops.

articles.title: 22 Somewhat Embarrassing Products You Can Order Online
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several companies introduce new products that can be purchased online, ranging from personal hygiene items to home goods. Examples include Squatty Potty stool, nickel foot file, weed cookbook, hemorrhoid cream, shoe deodorizer, Poo-Pourri before-you-go toilet spray, disposable urinals, memory book, bed bug spray, Tushy bidet attachment, gas relief pills, crafting book, antiperspirant foot lotion, skin balm, toothpaste, wart-removing gel, anti-diarrhea medication, nail biting polish, cereal marshmallows, butt mask, wine glass, fungal nail renewal treatment.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Optimus humanoid robot serving popcorn goes viral; says, ‘This will become normal in a few years'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk showcased the Tesla Optimus robot serving popcorn, marking a step towards its development as a general-purpose robot. Tesla envisions Optimus assisting with household chores and integrating into everyday life, with potential commercial sales projected to begin in 2026. Future upgrades aim to enhance autonomous movement and adaptability for use in various settings.

articles.title: Next dress looks 'chic and expensive' as shoppers snap it up for £32
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next is offering the 'Mini Shift Dress with Linen' for £32, available in five colors and various sizes. The dress features a lightweight linen blend, a scoop back, split side hem, and side pockets. Customer reviews indicate high satisfaction with the dress's style, comfort, and suitability for travel.

articles.title: How White-Label Casino Solutions Can Benefit Your Business
articles.summary: DSTGAMING offers white-label casino solutions designed to accelerate business growth in the gaming industry. These solutions provide pre-built platforms with extensive customization options for a flexible brand launch. The platform includes game integration, secure payment methods, support systems, crypto availability and regulatory compliance.

articles.title: Hess Announces New Mini Toy Truck Collection
articles.author: HESS TOY TRUCK
articles.summary: Hess Corporation announced the release of their new Mini Toy Truck Collection for $39.99. The collection is available exclusively at HessToyTruck.com and includes free standard shipping and Energizer batteries.

articles.title: Next's £32 versatile linen dress is 'perfect for holidays'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next offers the Mini Shift Dress with Linen for £32 in various colors and patterns, available in multiple sizes. Customers praise the dress for its style, comfort, and practicality, highlighting its suitability for summer holidays and versatility for both casual and dressy occasions. The dress features a lightweight linen blend, a scoop back, a split side hem, and side pockets.

articles.title: From the first stores to the heart of the market: 15 years of Lidl Cyprus
articles.author: Advertorial
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus introduced the 'Nóma' range, showcasing Cypriot gastronomy and supporting local producers. They also launched the Lidl Food Academy, focusing on education about sustainable eating. Further, Lidl introduced Lidl Plus, a digital loyalty program rewarding users with discounts and exclusive benefits.

articles.title: Tell HN: Windows notepad can now edit Markdown files
articles.summary: Microsoft has updated the Notepad application in Windows 11 (version 10.0.26100.4652) to include a new feature, represented by '...'.

articles.title: Kubota introduces upgraded online ordering platform
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Kubota (UK) Ltd has introduced a digital product.

articles.title: Ghost Recon: First-Person Perspective Development by Ubisoft
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Ubisoft is developing a new Ghost Recon title and exploring the integration of a first-person perspective into the gameplay. This shift aims to innovate within the tactical shooter genre and provide a more immersive experience, marking a departure from the series' traditional third-person view.

articles.title: UK PROPERTY ENTREPRENEUR MAKES SPLASH IN U.S WITH OPENING OF REVOLUTIONARY NEW CAR WASH CHAIN
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: AquaSonic Car Wash has launched its first location in Tampa, Florida, offering a revolutionary car wash experience with a membership model and high-tech, eco-friendly, rapid service. The company plans a major expansion across the U.S. and Europe, with $100m+ committed investment. The car wash features cutting-edge technology and sustainability, and offers an elevated wash experience with fast service.

articles.title: How Agentic AI Is Reshaping Consumer Marketing—And How To Navigate It
articles.author: Richard Jones
articles.summary: Wunderkind uses agentic AI as the foundation of its autonomous marketing platform. This AI adapts to consumer behavior in real-time, recommends strategies, and triggers personalized messages, reinventing marketing campaigns. The platform leverages real-time behavioral signals and economic trends to optimize messaging and offers, particularly during critical sales windows like Black Friday/Cyber Monday.

articles.title: LG Uplus lists ixi-GEN on AWS Bedrock to reach global AI market
articles.author: 세계의 소식들
articles.summary: LG Uplus Corp. has launched its proprietary small language model (sLLM), ixi-GEN, to the global market by listing it on Amazon Web Services' (AWS) AI marketplace. Specialized for the finance sector, ixi-GEN is now available on the Amazon Bedrock Marketplace, making LG Uplus the first Korean telecom company to provide an AI model via AWS.

articles.title: Naver plans new North America-tailored platform, ThingsBook
articles.author: 세계의 소식들
articles.summary: Naver Corp. is developing ThingsBook, a new user-generated content (UGC) social networking service specifically for North American users, expected to launch later in 2025. ThingsBook will be a taste-based content platform focused on organizing, collecting, and sharing favorite things. This new service will be a key part of Naver's expansion into the U.S. market.

articles.title: Harper Beckham debuts ultimate Gen Z look as she's hailed a 'blonde Posh Spice'
articles.author: Laura Sutcliffe
articles.summary: Victoria Beckham Beauty launched 'Colour Wash Blush' and showcased its application on Instagram. Victoria Beckham's daughter, Harper, appeared in a video demonstrating how to apply the blush. Victoria introduced her fans to her new blusher at the weekend, which has proved a big hit with shoppers already.

articles.title: Say Hello to Freshness: Godrej AER Power Pocket launches in Nigeria; breathe easy, breathe Godrej
articles.author: Daily Post Staff
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products launched Godrej AER Power Pocket in Nigeria. The product is a compact, plug-free air freshener designed for homes, offices, and small spaces, providing fragrance for up to 30 days. It is now available in stores nationwide and online retailers.

articles.title: Discover the power of innovation in today's leading flagship phone
articles.author: Nickie Wang
articles.summary: Smart Communications is offering pre-orders for the new Samsung Galaxy Z7 Series, including the Z Fold7, Z Flip7, and Z Flip7 FE, from July 9 to 31. The new foldables feature enhanced displays, upgraded cameras and sleek designs. Smart offers free storage upgrades, discounts on Samsung Care+, and Galaxy Buds, plus data and Smart Tag incentives for postpaid subscribers.

articles.title: Nando's fans rush to try new menu items from returning burger to 'girl dinner'
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Nando's has launched several new menu items, including the Super Caesar Wrap, featuring pulled chicken, croutons, lettuce, pickles, salad dressing, and PERi-honey. Additionally, the Nandino Burger, with grilled chicken and Lemon & Herb mayo, has made a comeback. Fans can also order meals with the new Garlic BBQ sauce.

articles.title: Samsung's new-gen foldables get an ‘ultra' boost
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 foldable smartphones, featuring design upgrades, improved camera capabilities, enhanced AI features, and enhanced durability. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is slimmer and lighter, with a Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite processor, a 200MP camera, and integrated Gemini AI. The Galaxy Z Flip7 boasts improved visibility, an upgraded dual-camera setup, and a larger battery.

articles.title: Sick of AI-Generated Images? DuckDuckGo Will Filter Them Out For You.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: DuckDuckGo has introduced a new feature to filter out AI-generated images from search results. This feature, accessible via an 'AI images' option in the toolbar, aims to reduce the number of AI-generated images users encounter. The filter uses manually curated open-source blocklists to achieve this.

articles.title: MUSK ANNOUNCES ‘BABY GROK'—A CHILD-FRIENDLY AI CHATBOT
articles.summary: xAI, led by Elon Musk, is planning to launch 'Baby Grok,' a kid-friendly version of its AI chatbot, Grok. This new application aims to provide a safe and educational digital experience with age-appropriate interactions for children. Baby Grok is designed to address online safety concerns and offer a suitable AI companion for younger audiences.

articles.title: 27 Kitchen Products To Make Cooking Much Easier
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: The article highlights new kitchen gadgets and products available for purchase, including the Instant Vortex Plus air fryer, the Instant Pot Duo Plus, a Ninja professional blender, and the Always Pan 2.0. Each product is described with its features, benefits, and availability through Amazon or Our Place, offering consumers new tools to enhance their cooking experiences.

articles.title: ZWSOFT Launches ZWCAD Flex in the U.S. and Canada: Powerful CAD Performance Meets Purchasing Flexibility
articles.author: ZWSOFT CO.
articles.summary: ZWSOFT has released ZWCAD Flex, a subscription-based CAD solution, in the United States and Canada. ZWCAD Flex offers advanced features, DWG compatibility, and high-speed performance with flexible licensing options.

articles.title: ZWSOFT Launches ZWCAD Flex in the U.S. and Canada: Powerful CAD Performance Meets Purchasing Flexibility
articles.summary: ZWSOFT has launched ZWCAD Flex, a subscription-based CAD solution in the United States and Canada, offering flexible licensing options for 2D and 3D modeling. UNISOC officially unveiled its next-generation flagship 4G SoC, the T7300, to global markets.

articles.title: Google's new AI called toy stores for me — and actually found a Labubu
articles.author: Amanda Caswell
articles.summary: Google is rolling out a new experimental feature in Gemini AI that allows it to call local businesses using Duplex technology. Gemini can check prices, confirm inventory, and ask about hours, providing users with a summary, representing a significant upgrade in how AI assists users. The feature is currently available to all U.S. users.

articles.title: How AI browsers like Perplexity Comet will reshape the internet—and the media
articles.author: Pete Pachal
articles.summary: Perplexity has launched Comet, an AI-powered browser featuring the Comet Assistant. This AI assistant aims to automate online tasks, acting as a personal intern. Comet's functionality includes tasks like online grocery shopping and appointment booking, showcasing its ability to perform research and operate software on behalf of users.

articles.title: Large commercial redevelopment proposed for Route 9, Jake Brown Road in Old Bridge
articles.author: Susan Loyer
articles.summary: Segme JBN Property, LLC has proposed a commercial project featuring a gas station with a convenience store, a fast-food restaurant with a drive-thru, and a car wash along Route 9 and Jake Brown Road. The project also includes plans for a warehouse building, a maintenance shed, and a car dealership within the township's industrial and economic development zone.

articles.title: Trade Vector AI Trading Platform-{HONOUR REVIEW}-Trade Vector AI: Your 24/7 Partner for Navigating Volatile Markets!
articles.summary: Trade Vector AI is an AI-powered web-based trading platform designed to provide real-time data analysis and predictive modeling, enhancing traders' ability to navigate complex markets. It features advanced pattern recognition, real-time market data processing, and predictive analytics. The platform offers AI-driven risk assessment tools, automated stop-loss and take-profit features, and portfolio diversification recommendations to help traders manage risks and optimize their investments.

articles.title: Kia eyeing broader EV, PBV expansion, says Ahmed Soudodi
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Kia is launching the K4 compact sedan and Tasman pickup in the Middle East. Kia is also introducing the EV3 and EV5 electric vehicles, as well as the PV5 purpose-built vehicle, in the region. These products are targeted towards specific customer needs, with the PV5 being geared towards fleet operators and delivery services.

articles.title: ‘No Limits, Just Possibilities': Motorola Teases Its Upcoming Smartphone, Likely To Feature Triple Camera Setup, Launch Details Coming Soon
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola India teased the upcoming launch of a new smartphone on July 21, 2025. The phone is expected to feature a triple rear camera setup. The official model name and launch date are expected to be announced soon.

articles.title: Exploring Alexa Plus through Its AI Agent Features
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon launched an updated Alexa Plus featuring agentic AI, enabling users to delegate tasks like booking reservations and finding electricians. The AI assistant integrates with services like Ticketmaster, OpenTable, Uber, and Thumbtack. Currently in Early Access beta, Amazon plans to include more integrations for grocery ordering (via multiple providers), Grubhub deliveries, and Vagaro spa visits.

articles.summary: The 10th annual Technology Showcase in Mountain View featured local innovations in robotics, AI, and 3D printing. Various tech companies showcased interactive exhibits and participated in discussions on the future of technology. The event highlights the city's vibrant tech community through the introduction of new technologies, products, or services.

articles.title: 농심, 신라면 글로벌 브랜드 슬로건 ‘Spicy Happiness In Noodles'

This slogan will be featured on 18 Shin Ramyun products and at 'Shin Ramyun Snacks' stores, which are planned to expand globally, along with a marketing campaign to promote 'Shin Ramyun's spicy happiness'.

articles.summary: YUAN High-Tech has launched Pandora, an ultra-compact edge AI platform powered by NVIDIA® Jetson Orin™ NX Super mode. This platform, weighing 470g and delivering 157 TOPS of AI performance, targets applications in education, smart retail, and robotics, enabling real-time analytics and localized AI-driven services.

articles.title: YUAN Unveils Pandora: Ready-to-Deploy Edge AI Designed for Developers

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold7, Z Flip7 Pre-orders Match S25 Series, Setting New Benchmark for Flagships in India
articles.summary: Samsung has announced record pre-orders for its newly launched Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy ZFlip7, and Galaxy Z Flip7 FE smartphones in India. The Galaxy Z Fold7 features improvements like a larger display, thinner design, and enhanced performance with the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy processor, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 boasts a larger FlexWindow display and a durable design. The Galaxy Z Flip7 FE has a 6.7 inch main display, and a 50MP FlexCam.

articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires users to download the WeAreIowa app to stream its content on mobile devices.

articles.title: Gen Z won't follow you unless you walk beside them
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Unstop allowed a talented intern to drive social media campaigns end-to-end. The intern's approach resulted in higher-than-average engagement levels, demonstrating a successful shift in marketing strategy. This shows a different approach to their social media services.

E.l.f. introduces Holy Hydration! face cream with SPF 30, while Kristen Ess launches a salon-level deep conditioning hair treatment. Dash offers a mini waffle maker for convenient home use and Hello Kitty collaborated with Pixi to release Sheet masks which leave skin plump and hydrated.

articles.title: Tesla's Optimus robot serves popcorn at Hollywood
articles.summary: Tesla's Optimus robot has been updated to include the functionality of serving popcorn. This new capability demonstrates the robot's evolving human-like skills.

These products range from dishwasher tablets and toilet wands to specialized cleaners for appliances, surfaces, and even makeup brushes. Some products mentioned include Iron Out rust stain remover, Keurig cleaner pods, Goo Gone foaming spray, The Pink Stuff, and Hope's Perfect sink cleaner.

articles.title: Sony Linkbuds S: Wireless Headphones on Sale for €99.99 (-18%)
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Soundcore introduced the Liberty 4 Pro earbuds offering powerful audio, and the Motion X600 speaker with Spatial Audio. Sony Linkbuds S are available at a discounted price of €99.99 and include features like Active Noise Cancellation and DSEE Extreme. Additionally, Anker's Soundcore Sleep A30 earbuds have been released, incorporating snore detection and sleep technology.

articles.title: Four Star rolls out SG60 celebration with $60 bedframe and up to $600 off sofas and furniture, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Four Star has launched its 'SG60 Sale' from July 23 to 27, offering promotions on mattresses and furniture. The sale features products like the ArcticSilk Metex mattress, bed frames from $60, storage beds from $600, and $600 off on living and dining sets including recliner and plush sofas. Customers can also get pintuck sheet sets for $60 and enjoy perks like GST absorption and free delivery.

articles.title: If Your Blow Dryer Brush Isn't Working, You Probably Need to Clean It
articles.summary: The Shark FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System's performance can be significantly reduced if the filter is not cleaned regularly. The product manual indicates that a flashing red light signals the need to clean the filter, which can restore the device's power. Similar cleaning methods also apply to Dyson Airwrap and Revlon One-Step Volumizer Plus.

articles.title: Ubisoft confirms new Ghost Recon as it responds to Stop Killing Games petition
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Ubisoft has launched a new Ghost Recon game. The launch addresses Ubisoft's live service strategy.

articles.title: Tired of AI images online? This search engine lets you hide them from results now
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: DuckDuckGo introduced a new feature aimed at filtering out AI-generated content.

articles.title: Likely Samsung Galaxy S26 Upgrade Now Makes Perfect Sense
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The Galaxy S26 is expected to have a redesigned look. This new design will be inspired by the Galaxy Z Fold 7.

articles.title: New York's A-Z Door & Security LLC Now Offering Full-Service Commercial Door Repair in Brooklyn
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A-Z Door & Security LLC launched new commercial and residential door solutions.

articles.title: OpenAI upgrades the ChatGPT platform
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new AI agent for the ChatGPT platform. This agent expands ChatGPT's capabilities to manage complex and multi-step tasks. The new system builds on features like Operator and Deep Research.

articles.title: Enlightened Generation Launches First Children's Clothing Brand Connecting Kids, Fashion, and Education
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Enlightened Generation, a children's clothing brand, launched today. The brand focuses on education and impact.

articles.title: xAI's Baby Grok Ambitions Aim for a Kid-Friendly Chatbot
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: xAI is launching Baby Grok, a simplified version of its Grok AI tool, targeted towards children. This represents xAI's effort to broaden its AI service offerings by catering to a younger demographic.
